objectives_aims_scope.objective: To present powershap, a novel wrapper feature selection method that leverages statistical hypothesis testing and Shapley values for quick and intuitive feature selection.
aims: To provide a feature selection method that achieves predictive performance on par with existing wrapper methods while being significantly faster.
To offer a feature selection tool that can be integrally used across various models and domains with ease of integration.

scope.method: The powershap method builds on the core assumption that an informative feature will have a larger impact on the prediction compared to a known random feature. It uses statistical tests and power calculations combined with Shapley values for feature selection.
scope.domain: The method can be used in different machine learning domains requiring robust feature selection.
